title: Which of the following most appropriately chara...

content.prompt: Which of the following most appropriately characterizes the violence exhibited in such episodes as Bacon’s Rebellion, the Boston Tea Party, Shays’ Rebellion, and the Whiskey Rebellion?

choices.label: The level of violence subsided after the American Revolution.
Violence was directed at “outsiders” or representatives of distant authority.
Most violence occurred because of the intervention of foreign powers in American internal affairs.

topic.text: 3.4: Philosophical Foundations of the American Revolution

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
